title: each country to be inserted into the Schedule to the International Protection Act
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the International Protection Act 2015
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the International Protection Act 2015 

(Safe Countries of Origin) (Amendment) Order 2024. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 31 January 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited international protection act 2015 (safe country origin) (amendment) order 2024 (2) order come operation 31 january 2024

title: each country to be inserted into the Schedule to the International Protection Act
heading: 2. The Schedule to the International Protection Act 2015 (Safe Countries
text_raw:
2. The Schedule to the International Protection Act 2015 (Safe Countries 

of Origin) Order 2018 (S.I. No. 121 of 2018)) is amended - 

(a) 

by the insertion of “People's Democratic Republic of Algeria” 
after “Montenegro”, 

and 

(b) by the insertion of “Republic of Botswana” after “Republic of 

Albania”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 January, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 2nd February, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [32] 3

title: each country to be inserted into the Schedule to the International Protection Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends the Schedule to the International Protection Act 2015 (Safe 
Countries of Origin) Order 2018. The Order adds the People's Democratic 
Republic of Algeria and the Republic of Botswana to the designated list of Safe 
Countries of Origin under section 72 of the International Protection Act 2015. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [32]
